products.name: Smartphone
products.longDescription: A feature-packed smartphone with a high-resolution display, fast processor, and advanced camera system.

products.name: Laptop
products.shortDescription: High-performance laptop for work and play.
products.longDescription: A versatile laptop that offers powerful performance for work tasks and gaming.

products.name: Headphones
products.longDescription: Wireless headphones with active noise cancellation for immersive audio experience.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.shortDescription: Smartwatch with health and fitness tracking.
products.longDescription: A smartwatch that monitors your health and fitness activities, and keeps you connected with notifications.

products.name: Camera
products.longDescription: A high-resolution digital camera that captures stunning photos and videos.

products.name: TV
products.longDescription: A 4K television with a large screen and vibrant colors. Enjoy high-resolution content with excellent picture quality.

products.name: Kettle
products.longDescription: An electric kettle with fast heating and automatic shut-off. Perfect for brewing tea and other hot beverages.

products.name: Fitness Tracker
products.shortDescription: Smart fitness tracker with activity monitoring.
products.longDescription: A smart fitness tracker that monitors activity and heart rate. Track your physical activity and improve your health.

products.name: Vacuum Cleaner
products.shortDescription: Robotic vacuum cleaner with automatic navigation.
products.longDescription: A robotic vacuum cleaner with automatic navigation and wet mopping function. Keep your home clean without effort.

products.name: Blender
products.shortDescription: High-speed blender for smoothies and more.
products.longDescription: A high-speed blender that can blend fruits, vegetables, and ice to make delicious smoothies and shakes.

products.name: Toaster
products.longDescription: A 2-slice toaster with adjustable browning settings and a removable crumb tray for easy cleaning.

products.name: Monitor
products.longDescription: A computer monitor with high resolution and wide viewing angle. Provides crisp and quality display of graphics and text.

products.name: Fitness Dumbbell
products.longDescription: A fitness dumbbell with adjustable weight, perfect for strength training and resistance exercises. Helps develop muscles and improve physical endurance.

products.name: Iron
products.longDescription: A steam iron with vertical steaming function. Provides fast and high-quality ironing of clothes and textiles.

products.name: Microwave Oven
products.longDescription: A microwave oven with a grill and various cooking modes. Perfect for reheating, cooking, and baking a variety of dishes.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.longDescription: A waterproof Bluetooth speaker with excellent sound quality. Allows you to listen to music and make calls wirelessly.

products.name: Soccer Ball
products.longDescription: A soccer ball for training with high quality and durability. Ideal for training and playing on both outdoor and indoor fields.

products.name: Pocket Flashlight
products.longDescription: A pocket flashlight with LED illumination and adjustable brightness. Perfect for hiking, camping, and emergency situations.

products.name: Kitchen Knife Set
products.longDescription: A kitchen knife set with a holder, including various types of knives for different cutting and food preparation needs.

products.name: Portable Power Bank
products.shortDescription: Portable power bank for device charging.
products.longDescription: A portable power bank with high capacity and fast charging. Perfect for travel and extended trips.
